title: #232: Food Chain Reaction
description:
In November of 2015, some of the worst organizations on the planet sponsored an event simulating the breakdown of the global food supply chain. The timeframe that was simulated was from 2020 through 2030, and wouldn’t you know it, the year that they predicted that food prices would shoot through the roof was 2022. Right on schedule.

With the many questions surrounding similar events such as Event 201 and the World Economic Forum’s CyberPolygon, it is reasonable to once again ask the question of whether these events are simulations of potential events, or predictions about events that they know are actually coming?
